name: Reporter Bot
description: Telegram reporting bot using Pyrogram with multi-session support and guided inline UI.

API_ID.description: Default Telegram API ID (used if the user does not supply one in /report).

API_HASH.description: Default Telegram API Hash (used if the user does not supply one in /report).

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection string for persisting session strings (leave empty to use in-memory storage).
